pageMeta.title: Budgeting Tools
pageMeta.description: Provides a set of tools to create and track your budget, helping users manage their finances effectively.

expenseTracking.title: Expense Tracking
expenseTracking.description: Allows users to log and categorize their expenses, providing a clear overview of their spending habits.

cards.title: Easy Expense Logging
cards.description: Effortlessly log your expenses with our user-friendly interface. Simply enter the amount, select a category, and add a description if needed.

cards.title: Categorize Expenses
cards.description: Organize your expenses into categories to better understand your spending patterns.

cards.title: Clear Spending Overview
cards.description: Get a comprehensive overview of your spending habits with intuitive charts and graphs.

cards.title: Smart Expense Insights
cards.description: Receive personalized insights and recommendations based on your spending patterns.
